java.com.checkout.services
Interface SuperMarket

All Known Implementing Classes:
SuperMarketImpl
public interface SuperMarket

Interface to provide functionalities like checkout, add item, update item

Author:
vinay

Method Summary
 void addItem(java.lang.String itemName, int price)
          This method will provide facility to add just itemName and prize without offer details.
 void addItem(java.lang.String itemName, int price, int purchaseQuantity, int atPriceQuantity)
          This method will provide facility to add a new item with regular price and offer.
 int checkout(java.lang.String items)
          This method will provide facility to perform checkout function on items which will return total price of all items based on discount available on those items.
 void updateItem(java.lang.String itemName, int price)
          This method will provide facility to update an existing item without affecting previous offer details.
 void updateItem(java.lang.String itemName, int price, int purchaseQuantity, int atPriceQuantity)
          This method will provide facility to update price and offer of the existing item.
 

Method Detail

checkout

int checkout(java.lang.String items)
             throws NullOrEmptyItemsException,
                    ItemDoesNotExistException
This method will provide facility to perform checkout function on items which will return total price of all items based on discount available on those items. It will throw an exception if items scanned are invalid (null, empty, not exists).

Parameters:
items - string of items for which we want to calculate total price
Returns:
Throws:
NullOrEmptyItemsException
ItemDoesNotExistException

addItem

void addItem(java.lang.String itemName,
             int price,
             int purchaseQuantity,
             int atPriceQuantity)
             throws java.lang.Exception
This method will provide facility to add a new item with regular price and offer. It will throw an exception if the new item to be added is already available in the system.

Parameters:
itemName - item name
price - item price
purchaseQuantity - quantity to purchase at discount rate
atPriceQuantity - quantity to consider to calculate discounted price
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

addItem

void addItem(java.lang.String itemName,
             int price)
             throws java.lang.Exception
This method will provide facility to add just itemName and prize without offer details. It will throw an exception if the new item to be added is already available in the system.

Parameters:
itemName - name of item
price - item price
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

updateItem

void updateItem(java.lang.String itemName,
                int price)
                throws ItemDoesNotExistException
This method will provide facility to update an existing item without affecting previous offer details. It will throw an exception if the item to be updated is not available in the system.

Parameters:
itemName - name of item
price - item price
Throws:
ItemDoesNotExistException

updateItem

void updateItem(java.lang.String itemName,
                int price,
                int purchaseQuantity,
                int atPriceQuantity)
                throws ItemDoesNotExistException
This method will provide facility to update price and offer of the existing item. It will throw an exception if the item to be updated is not available in the system.

Parameters:
itemName - item name
price - item price
purchaseQuantity - quantity to purchase at discount rate
atPriceQuantity - quantity to consider to calculate discounted price
Throws:
ItemDoesNotExistException
